Activity: Wake up, put on a smile, and head to work! Log into the EHR system and check for new messages.
Review scheduled appointments and identify patients presenting for influenza-like symptoms. Prepare the assessment tools and EHR documentation templates.
Greet the first patient with a warm and welcoming attitude. Conduct a thorough influenza symptom assessment using the EHR-integrated protocols.
Enter the patient's demographic information, medical history, vaccination status, and symptoms into the EHR with accuracy and completeness. Ensure no fields are left blank.
Second patient assessment and EHR entry. Maintain a positive and empathetic approach.
Enter the second patient's data, making sure that every details are entered into the EHR.
Quick break! Grab a snack and catch up on some funny internet videos to recharge.
Third patient assessment and EHR Documentation. Keep going!
Enter the information for the third patient into the EHR.
Lunch break! Grab some healthy and tasty food!
Fourth patient assessment and EHR Documentation. Continue the work.
Enter all the data for the fourth patient into the EHR.
Fifth patient assessment and EHR Documentation
Put the data into the EHR.
Sixth patient assessment and documentation. Keep being patient and kind!
Put the data into the EHR. Make sure to double check the EHR.
Email @Clinlead-1 to discuss if we can update the influenza assessment with patient satisfaction measurement. Subject: Influenza Assessment Update Proposal
Review all EHR entries for completeness and accuracy. Correct any errors or omissions. Contact @Helpdesk-1 for assistance with any technical issues.
Prepare for tomorrow's patient schedule and ensure all necessary materials are readily available.
Clock out and head home. Relax and unwind!
